attractions.name: Lake Auronzo
attractions.shortDescription: A peaceful lake ideal for boating, swimming, or walking.
attractions.longDescription: Lake Auronzo offers a peaceful atmosphere, ideal for boating, swimming, or simply walking around its scenic shores.
attractions.getThere: Lake Auronzo is easily accessible by car or public transportation from the village of Auronzo.

attractions.name: Tre Cime di Lavaredo
attractions.shortDescription: Famous mountain peaks in the Dolomites.
attractions.longDescription: The Tre Cime di Lavaredo are a well-known hiking and climbing destination with breathtaking views.
attractions.getThere: The Tre Cime di Lavaredo can be reached by car or by hiking from the nearby village of Auronzo.

attractions.name: Terme nei dintorni
attractions.longDescription: Bad Moos Thermal Spa offers 25000 sqm of Spa, including various saunas, Turkish baths, heated indoor and outdoor pools, gym use, etc. Massage options available.
attractions.getThere: Bad Moos Thermal Spa is easily accessible by car or public transportation from the village of Auronzo.

attractions.name: Lake Braies
attractions.longDescription: Lake Braies is a wonderful lake, beautiful in every season. In autumn, trees of every shade of red and yellow. You can rent a rowboat on the lake. Location where 'Three Steps from Heaven' was filmed.
attractions.getThere: Lake Braies is easily accessible by car or public transportation from the village of Auronzo.

attractions.name: Lake Sorapis
attractions.shortDescription: Turquoise glacial lake and wonderful hike.
attractions.longDescription: Lake Sorapis is a turquoise glacial lake and a wonderful hike for medium-experienced hikers. The view is worth the effort.
attractions.getThere: Lake Sorapis is easily accessible by car or public transportation from the village of Auronzo.
